E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/1/1977
Subject: Progress of Jerry Dybzinski
Dear Sir,
Jerry Dybzinski has an AVG of .322 at A Wisconsin Rapids Twins!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 9/4/1977
Subject: Status of Larry Johnson
Dear Sir,
Larry Johnson shouldn't play at AA Orlando Twins!
He has an AVG of .246 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
